section.title: Textbook
section.p: We are trying out a new free textbook written by PCC faculty. The book is called ORCCA (Open Resources for Community College Algebra). We're excited to replace a roughly \$117 book with this free book and save you a significant amount of money. This is the first time any MTH 95 section is using this book (along with ten other sections at PCC), and we will be asking you for your thoughts and feedback about it. We will work to make it better every term from here on out, so that future students have a free, excellent basic algebra textbook.
If you find any issues with this book where you think we could make it better, please let me know about each one.
Access this book as a web site at spot.pcc.edu/math/orcca/.
Download a printable version of it at spot.pcc.edu/ajordan/orcca.pdf.
Purchase a printed copy for \$12.00 plus shipping at Amazon.
